dmca.title: Online-Bingo Complains of Infringement by Bingo-Directory
dmca.body:
24 Nov 04 17:18    [private]    +XX XXX XXXXXXX    p.1 

Wednesday, November 24, 2004 
Sender Information: Online-Bingo.com 
Sent by: [private] [private]@online-bingo.com 

Recipient Information: Google Inc. 
[private] Mountain View CA 94043 
phone: (XXX) XXX-XXXX fax: (XXX) XXX-XXXX

Re: DMCA violation of site 

Dear Google: 

I am writing to inform you that a website in your directory has stolen: -content/designs/concepts/navigation/text from my site. 

1. The copyrighted work that was stolen, was from http://www.online-bingo.com (Entire site). The infringing pages are: 

http://www.bingo-directory.com/ 
http://www.bingo-directory.cov/directory/ 
http://www.bingo-directory.com/editorschoice.htm 
http://www.bingo-directory.com/bingopromotions.htm

http://www.bingo-directory.comlbingocontact.htm 
http://www.bingo-directory.com/bingo-editors-choiee.html 
http://www.bingo-directory.com/bingopromotions.htm 
http://www.bingo-directory.corn/bingo-reviews.htm 
http://www.bingo-drectory.com/bingo-stories.html 
http://www.bingo-directory.com/bingotips.htm 

<HR />
24 Nov 04 17:18    [private]    +XX XXX XXXXXXX     p.2

Through Google search you can find the pages: 

http://www.google.com/search?sourceid=navclient&ie=UTF-8&q=bingo+directory 
http://www.google.com/search2numelOO&h1=enAlr=&q=bingo 

3. You can contact me at [private]@online-bingo.com 

4. The information I have for the site at question is: 
[private]@intergaminq.info / [private]@bingo-directory.com / support e-mail: [private]@bingo-directory.com . The number listed does not seem to work under their whois information. 

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or ant authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

Sincerely, 

[private]
